title: orderError
description: Details of an Error on an Order.

objectType.description: The type of the object, orderError.

errorCode.description: The error code for the Error.

errorInformation.description: Additional (free form) information about the Error.

orderItemReference.description: A reference number that can be used to refer to the order item that this Error applies to.

correctionRequired.description: If true, indicates that this Error requires correction (via a corrective or supplemental Order).
